project.objective:
Lack of innovation management capacity is recognised as an important barrier to creating economic impact (competitiveness, growth and jobs) from innovation activities in SMEs.
To address this, this action shall provide specialized consulting services addressing innovation management capacity to SMEs in the East of England which possess significant innovation activities.
Beneficiaries of the SME instrument shall as well receive support to enhance their innovation management capacity through this action.
project.title: Provision of services to enhance the innovation management capacities of SMEs in the East of England - 2014
